    VertexAttribDescriptor - Datensatzklasse in Kartoffel.Licht.Vulkan
    A VertexDescriptor describes the data of the vertex inside one buffer, as in "this part of the buffer is that vertexes data, etc..".
    A VertexAttribDescriptor then describes how this data is split and how its accessed in shaders.
    An example can be viewed at VertexDescriptor.
    VertexAttribDescriptor(int, int, int, int) - Konstruktor für Datensatzklasse Kartoffel.Licht.Vulkan.VertexAttribDescriptor
    Erstellt eine Instanz einer Datensatzklasse VertexAttribDescriptor.
    VertexDescriptor - Datensatzklasse in Kartoffel.Licht.Vulkan
    A VertexDescriptor describes the data of the vertex inside one buffer, as in "this part of the buffer is that vertexes data, etc..".
    A VertexAttribDescriptor then describes how this data is split and how its accessed in shaders.
    Example:

    A buffer is filled with elements, each 3xfloats (position) + 2xfloats (UV-coordinates)
    1.3|2.0|5.3|0|0|4.2|2.0|4.3|1|0|1.6|0.0|2.3|1|1|3.3|1.5|3.8|0|1| a
    A float is 4 bytes, so one element is 4*5 (20) bytes in size!
    VertexDescriptor(int, int, boolean) - Konstruktor für Datensatzklasse Kartoffel.Licht.Vulkan.VertexDescriptor
    Erstellt eine Instanz einer Datensatzklasse VertexDescriptor.

    VulkanInstance - Klasse in Kartoffel.Licht.Vulkan
    There is no global state in Vulkan and all per-application state is stored in a VkInstance object.

    VulkanObject - Schnittstelle in Kartoffel.Licht.Vulkan
